# isHidden

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that determines the visibility of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isHidden: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to hide the item, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to display the item.

## Customizing item appearance

- **style**: The style of the item.
- **UIBarButtonItem.Style**: Constants that specify the style of an item.
- **tintColor**: The tint color to apply to the button item.
- **isSelected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the button is in a selected state.
- **width**: The width of the item.
- **possibleTitles**: The set of possible titles to display on the bar button.
